result.eng: I like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ga: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.orig: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an lae
result.html: Is maith liom bricfeasta mór a ithe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom bricfeasta mór a iṫe ag tús an laeI like to eat a big breakfast at the beginning of the day.

result.html: Bhí uibheacha agam ag bricfeastaI had eggs for breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí uiḃeaċa agam ag bricfeastaI had eggs for breakfast.

result.ga: D'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeasta
result.orig: D'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeasta
result.html: D'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeastaI ate beans for breakfast.
result.ponchtml: D'iṫ mé pónairí le haġaiḋ bricfeastaI ate beans for breakfast.

result.eng: She prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.html: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ sí bricfeasta mar ba ġnáṫ léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.

result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóill
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóill
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé bricfeasta go fóillI haven't had breakfast yet.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé bricfeasta go fóillI haven't had breakfast yet.

result.eng: I haven't eaten my breakfast yet.
result.ga: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóill
result.orig: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóill
result.html: Níor ith mé mo bhricfeasta go fóillI haven't eaten my breakfast yet.
result.ponchtml: Níor iṫ mé mo ḃricfeasta go fóillI haven't eaten my breakfast yet.

result.html: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ga: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.orig: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.html: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃíonn am agam iṫe fiú aṁáinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.html: Ith do bhricfeastaEat your breakfast!
result.ponchtml: Iṫ do ḃricfeastaEat your breakfast!

result.eng: I get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.
result.ga: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.orig: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.html: Éirím timpeall a hocht agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa bhaileI get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.
result.ponchtml: Éirím timpeall a hoċt agus bíonn bricfeasta agam sa ḃaileI get up around eight and I have breakfast at home.

result.eng: I have my breakfast at home.
result.ga: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.orig: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaile
result.html: Bíonn mo bhricfeasta agam sa bhaileI have my breakfast at home.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ḃricfeasta agam sa ḃaileI have my breakfast at home.

result.eng: I have breakfast in a café.
result.html: Bíonn bricfeasta agam i gcaiféI have breakfast in a café.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn bricfeasta agam i gcaiféI have breakfast in a café.

result.eng: Do you have breakfast at home?
result.ga: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaile
result.orig: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaile
result.html: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa bhaileDo you have breakfast at home?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn bricfeasta agat sa ḃaileDo you have breakfast at home?
